# RPC Providers

To interact with the Massa blockchain, you can select from any of the listed providers. Be aware that the latency you encounter may vary depending on the provider's geographical location. To enhance redundancy and facilitate load balancing, consider using multiple providers.

| Provider   | Endpoint                            |
| ---------- | ----------------------------------- |
| [Massa](/docs/build/networks-faucets) | `https://test.massa.net/api/v2` |
